content.prompt: The excerpt would be of limited use to a historian seeking to explain the political position common in the 1990s that the United States should

choices.label: help immigrants affected by international crises
recruit immigrant laborers for agricultural work
reduce the influence of new immigrant cultures
celebrate the diversity created by immigration

topic.text: 9.5: Migration and Immigration in the 1990s and 2000s

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain the significance of a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience, including how these might limit the use(s) of a source.
